data.name: 边缘世界 Edge Worlds
data.detailed_description:
Edge worlds is a horizontal action game(ACT game). In the game, you can defeat the enemy with quick and continuous moves, obtain equipment, medicine and other resources, use special moves to avoid the enemy's attack, or use resources, equipment and so on to improve your own attributes and challenge more difficult scene.



.Multiple characters can be used. Unlock the characters as the level progresses.

.Character performance can be improved by upgrading, equipment, title, custom enhancement attributes, etc.

.All scene can be challenged repeatedly. The more difficult the level is, the better the reward will be.

.Making rational use of the character's continuous move characteristics can reduce the difficulty of clearance.



.character unlocking:

"Lily", "Dean": available initially.

"Xuantie": use "lily" or "Dean" to complete the task of unlocking the character at the level "steel factory".

"Nebula": use "lily" or "Dean" to complete the task of unlocking characters at the level "Research Institute".

"Seek": use "nebula" to pass the level "zenith seat" for the first time.

"Ghost": use "black iron" to pass the level "zenith seat" for the first time.

"Copy X": use "seek" or "ghost" to pass the level "zenith seat" for the first time.



If you need to exchange suggestions or feed back game bugs, you can add Q group: 298588301

Edge worlds is a horizontal action game(ACT game). In the game, you can defeat the enemy with quick and continuous moves, obtain equipment, medicine and other resources, use special moves to avoid the enemy's attack, or use resources, equipment and so on to improve your own attributes and challenge more difficult scene.

data.short_description: A horizontal version of the customs clearance action game, multi role, combo, equipment, custom attributes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: intel CORE i3-3200 及以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT730 及以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: intel CORE i5-4460 及以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660 及以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
